text: Ensign Pulver is a 1964 American World War II comedy movie directed by Joshua Logan and is the sequel to the 1955 movie Mister Roberts. It stars Robert Walker, Burl Ives, Walter Matthau, Millie Perkins, Kay Medford, Larry Hagman, Diana Sands, Jack Nicholson, James Coco and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1964 comedy movies Category:1964 war movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American sequel movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Joshua Logan
title: Ensign Pulver
